00029 #include "CellPropertyCollection.hpp"
00030 
00031 CellPropertyCollection::CellPropertyCollection()
00032     : mpCellPropertyRegistry(NULL)
00033 {
00034 }
00035 
00036 CellPropertyRegistry* CellPropertyCollection::GetCellPropertyRegistry()
00037 {
00038     if (!mpCellPropertyRegistry)
00039     {
00040         /*
00041          * If no cell population has taken ownership of the registry and assigned
00042          * this class a pointer, then store a pointer to the singleton.
00043          */
00044         mpCellPropertyRegistry = CellPropertyRegistry::Instance();
00045     }
00046     return mpCellPropertyRegistry;
00047 }
00048 
00049 void CellPropertyCollection::SetCellPropertyRegistry(CellPropertyRegistry* pRegistry)
00050 {
00051     mpCellPropertyRegistry = pRegistry;
00052 }
00053 
00054 void CellPropertyCollection::AddProperty(const boost::shared_ptr<AbstractCellProperty>& rProp)
00055 {
00056     if (HasProperty(rProp))
00057     {
00058         EXCEPTION("That property object is already in the collection.");
00059     }
00060     mProperties.insert(rProp);
00061 }
00062 
00063 bool CellPropertyCollection::HasProperty(const boost::shared_ptr<AbstractCellProperty>& rProp) const
00064 {
00065     return (mProperties.find(rProp) != mProperties.end());
00066 }
00067 
00068 void CellPropertyCollection::RemoveProperty(const boost::shared_ptr<AbstractCellProperty>& rProp)
00069 {
00070     IteratorType it = mProperties.find(rProp);
00071     if (it == mProperties.end())
00072     {
00073         EXCEPTION("Collection does not contain the given property.");
00074     }
00075     else
00076     {
00077         mProperties.erase(it);
00078     }
00079 }
00080 
00081 unsigned CellPropertyCollection::GetSize() const
00082 {
00083     return mProperties.size();
00084 }
00085 
00086 CellPropertyCollection::Iterator CellPropertyCollection::Begin()
00087 {
00088     return mProperties.begin();
00089 }
00090 
00091 CellPropertyCollection::Iterator CellPropertyCollection::End()
00092 {
00093     return mProperties.end();
00094 }
00095 
00096 boost::shared_ptr<AbstractCellProperty> CellPropertyCollection::GetProperty() const
00097 {
00098     if (GetSize() == 1)
00099     {
00100         return *mProperties.begin();
00101     }
00102     else
00103     {
00104         EXCEPTION("Can only call GetProperty on a collection of size 1.");
00105     }
00106 }
